moves.1. e4: my standard king pawn opening. vienna possible is in the making
moves.4. d3: defending the center, missing Nxe5 here
moves.5. Ne2: retreating,blocks in my bishop ensnaring it in a self inflicted trap. so far so good for the X Machine
moves.6. Nxe5: A saving grace in the making St.KnightsBurg lives!
moves.6... Bd6: Persecution from a revenge seeking bishop!
moves.7. Nxg4: Death to the bishop of pinnimere Bay!
moves.8... Qf6: good counter attack, at first appears to be a blunder, but is really genius in the making
moves.9. Nf5: brilliant response if i do say so myself
moves.9... Nc6: developmental move, choice of castles in Quebec and Kazakhstan, only problem what about the G Knight?
moves.10. Qxg4: Gulp.......Swallow.........burp. Knights taste funny. the machine man resigns here, down 5 material points. good game, x-machine. Earlier i said this was the last of 2 games between us. that is not true. shortly following the machine offered a revenge match against me. i eagerly accepted and so far it's getting interesting. Apparently that bishop who  is still alive at the end of this game is wanting a bit more action against the queen and company. {grin} good luck X in game 3. so far 2-0 me. Until next time this is The Warrior signing off
